title: Frames are unsteady even with high fps and low ping

embed.description: UDP access to remote DNS servers (port 53) appears to pass through a firewall or proxy. The client was unable to transmit a non-DNS traffic on this UDP port, but was able to transmit a legitimate DNS request, suggesting that a proxy, NAT, or firewall intercepted and blocked the deliberately invalid request.

body:
Whenever I play League I consistently get small spikes

I have done the test, are there any fixes?

I play League with 70 ping and ~150 fps.

replies.body: Most of the time FPS issues can be traced back to some sort of bad interaction between the game and your graphics card. Let's first make sure you've got all of the most recent driver updates, but also check out the other steps listed in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover the rest of your bases.
